query:
-- Buscar exercícios publicados que deveriam aparecer para o aluno
SELECT 
  se.id,
  se.title,
  se.subjectId,
  sub.name as subject_name,
  se.status,
  se.availableFrom,
  se.availableTo,
  NOW() as current_time,
  CASE 
    WHEN se.availableFrom <= NOW() THEN 'Disponível'
    ELSE 'Futuro'
  END as availability
FROM student_exercises se
JOIN subjects sub ON se.subjectId = sub.id
WHERE se.status = 'published'
  AND se.subjectId IN (
    SELECT subjectId 
    FROM subjectEnrollments 
    WHERE studentId = 1
  )
ORDER BY se.availableFrom DESC;
